DOC.brief_summary: This 2-period randomize crossover study free-living subject self-selected diet . The objective study compare effect ¾ cup blend dry plum , fig , date raisin ( DPFDR ) isocaloric macronutrient match snack food blood pressure , vascular health lipid lipoproteins 50 participant representative U.S. population risk cardiovascular disease ( overweight/obese , elevated LDL-cholesterol , prehypertension , and/or prediabetes ) . The investigator hypothesize inclusion DPFDR diet decrease blood pressure LDL-cholesterol , improve artery function ( assessed standard blood pressure measure , 24 hr ambulatory blood pressure , central blood pressure arterial stiffness ) compare control group baseline .
